name: Sea Dragon Wyrmling
description: The Sea Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon with the ability to manipulate cold, having a striking physical presence.
memorable: Its Tidal Breath ability can disrupt enemies and change the dynamics of the battlefield with cold and bludgeoning damage.
goals: To dominate in both aquatic and terrestrial battles, using its abilities strategically.
relations: Related to other dragons and sea creatures, may serve more powerful dragons or deities.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and the ability to breathe both air and water.
weaknesses: Average dexterity, making it less effective at dodging attacks.
attacks: Bite attack deals piercing and cold damage, and Tidal Breath unleashes a wave that can push and knock down enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Tidal Breath can deal significant area damage and control enemy positioning.
senses: Possesses blindsight 10 feet, allowing it to navigate through low visibility conditions.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Above average Strength and Constitution scores.
Good mobility both on land and in the air.
Effective in both social interactions thanks to high Charisma.
Can command respect and manipulate other creatures.
Strong combatant with a tactical mindset.
test_queries: sea dragon with high charisma and cold immunity
medium dragon that can breathe both air and water
cunning dragon with bludgeoning and cold damage
